name: Document

properties.name: parent
properties.description: The object's container.

properties.name: typename
properties.description: The class name of the object.

properties.name: backgroundLayer
properties.description: The background layer for the document.

properties.name: bitsPerChannel
properties.description: The number of bits per channel.

properties.name: colorProfileType
properties.description: The type of color model that defines the working space of the document.

properties.name: colorProfileName
properties.description: The name of the color profile. Valid only when no value is specified for color profile kind (to indicate a custom color profile).

properties.name: mode
properties.description: The color profile.

properties.name: componentChannels
properties.description: The color component channels for this document.

properties.name: activeHistoryState
properties.description: The current history state for this document.

properties.name: activeHistoryBrushSource
properties.description: The history state to use with the history brush.

properties.name: activeLayer
properties.description: The selected layer.

properties.name: activeChannels
properties.description: The selected channels.

properties.name: info
properties.description: Metadata about the document.

properties.name: printSettings
properties.description: Document print settings.

properties.name: fullName
properties.description: The full path name of the document.

properties.name: height
properties.description: The height of the document.

properties.name: managed
properties.description: If true, the document is a workgroup document.

properties.name: saved
properties.description: If true, the document been saved since the last change.

properties.name: name
properties.description: The document name.

properties.name: path
properties.description: The path to the document.

properties.name: quickMaskMode
properties.description: If true, the document is in Quick Mask mode.

properties.name: resolution
properties.description: The resolution of the document (in pixels per inch)

properties.name: selection
properties.description: The selected area of the document.

properties.name: width
properties.description: The width of the document.

properties.name: histogram
properties.description: A histogram showing the number of pixels at each color intensity level for the composite channel.

properties.name: pixelAspectRatio
properties.description: The (custom) pixel aspect ratio of the document. Range: 0.100 to 10.000.

properties.name: xmpMetadata
properties.description: The XMP properties of the document. The Camera RAW settings are stored here.

properties.name: measurementScale
properties.description: The measurement scale of the document.

properties.name: id
properties.description: The unique ID of this document.

properties.name: layers
properties.description: The layers collection in the document.

properties.name: layerSets
properties.description: The layer sets collection in the document.

properties.name: artLayers
properties.description: The art layers collection in the document.

properties.name: channels
properties.description: The channels collection in this document.

properties.name: guides
properties.description: The guides in this document.

properties.name: historyStates
properties.description: The history states collection in this document.

properties.name: layerComps
properties.description: The layer comps collection in this document.

properties.name: pathItems
properties.description: The path items collection in this document.

properties.name: countItems
properties.description: The current count items in the document.

properties.name: colorSamplers
properties.description: The current color samplers associated with the document.

methods.name: duplicate
methods.description: Duplicate this object.

methods.name: close
methods.description: Closes the document.

parameters.description: Specifies whether changes should be saved before closing.
parameters.name: saving

methods.name: convertProfile
methods.description: Converts the document from using one color profile to using another.

parameters.name: destinationProfile
parameters.description: The color profile to convert to. Either a string specifying a color profile, one of the working color spaces, or Lab color.

parameters.name: intent
parameters.description: The conversion intent.

parameters.name: blackPointCompensation
parameters.description: If true, black point compensation is used.
If true, dither is used.
parameters.name: dither

methods.name: changeMode
methods.description: Changes the mode of the document.

parameters.name: destinationMode
parameters.description: The mode to change to.

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: Options for changing the mode.

methods.name: crop
methods.description: Crops the document.

parameters.name: bounds
parameters.description: The area to crop.
The angle of cropping bounds.
parameters.name: angle
width
parameters.description: The width of the resulting document.

parameters.name: height
parameters.description: The height of the resulting document.

methods.name: exportDocument
methods.description: Exports the document.

parameters.name: exportIn
parameters.description: The file to export to.
The type of export.
parameters.name: exportAs
options
parameters.description: Options for the specified export type.

methods.name: flipCanvas
methods.description: Flips the canvas horizontally or vertically.

parameters.name: direction
parameters.description: The direction in which to flip the canvas.

methods.name: importAnnotations
methods.description: Imports annotations into the document.

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: The document to import annotations from.

methods.name: flatten
methods.description: Flattens all layers.

methods.name: mergeVisibleLayers
methods.description: Flattens all visible layers in the document.

methods.name: paste
methods.description: Pastes contents of the clipboard into the document.

parameters.description: If true, contents are pasted into the current selection.
parameters.name: intoSelection

methods.name: print
methods.description: Prints the document.

parameters.description: The encoding type.
parameters.name: postScriptEncoding

parameters.description: The color space for the source.
parameters.name: sourceSpace
printSpace
parameters.description: The color space for the printer. Can be "nothing" (meaning same as source); one of the working spaces or Lab color; or a string specifying a color space. Default: nothing.
The color conversion intent.
parameters.name: intent

parameters.description: If true, black point compensation is used.
parameters.name: blackPointCompensation

methods.name: printOneCopy
methods.description: Print one copy of the document.

methods.name: revealAll
methods.description: Expands the document to show clipped sections.

methods.name: rasterizeAllLayers
methods.description: Rasterizes all layers.

methods.name: recordMeasurements
methods.description: Records the measurements of document.

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: The source of the measurements to record.

parameters.name: dataPoints
parameters.description: An array of identifiers of data points to record. Any data points not appropriate for the specified source are ignored.

methods.name: rotateCanvas
methods.description: Rotates the canvas.

parameters.name: angle
parameters.description: The number of degrees to rotate. A positive angle rotates the canvas clockwise; a negative value rotates the canvas counter-clockwise.

methods.name: resizeCanvas
methods.description: Changes the size of the canvas.

parameters.name: width
parameters.description: The desired width of the canvas.

parameters.name: height
parameters.description: The desired height of the canvas.
The anchor point to resize around.
parameters.name: anchor

methods.name: resizeImage
methods.description: Changes the size of the image.

parameters.name: width
parameters.description: The desired width of the image.

parameters.name: height
parameters.description: The desired height of the image.

parameters.name: resolution
parameters.description: The resolution (in pixels per inch)
The downsample method.
parameters.name: resampleMethod

parameters.description: Amount of noise value when using preserve details (range: 0 - 100)
parameters.name: amount

methods.name: splitChannels
methods.description: Splits the channels of the document.

methods.name: save
methods.description: Saves the document.

methods.name: saveAs
methods.description: Saves the document with the specified save options.

parameters.name: saveIn
parameters.description: The file to save to, specified as a string containing the full file path or an alias. If not specified, the document is saved to its existing file.

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: Options for the specified file type.

parameters.name: asCopy
parameters.description: Saves the document as a copy, leaving the original open.

parameters.name: extensionType
parameters.description: Appends the specified extension to the file name.

methods.name: suspendHistory
methods.description: Provides a single history state for the entire script. Allows a single undo for all actions taken in the script.

parameters.name: historyString
parameters.description: The string to use for the history state.

parameters.name: javaScriptString
parameters.description: A string of JavaScript code to execute during the suspension of history.

methods.name: trap
methods.description: Applies trapping to a CMYK document. Valid only when 'mode' = CMYK.

parameters.name: width
parameters.description: The trap width in pixels.

methods.name: trim
methods.description: Trims the transparent area around the image on the specified sides of the canvas.

parameters.description: The color or type of pixels to base the trim on.
parameters.name: type

parameters.description: If true, trims away the top of the document.
parameters.name: top

parameters.description: If true, trims away the left of the document.
parameters.name: left

parameters.description: If true, trims away the bottom of the document.
parameters.name: bottom

parameters.description: If true, trims away the right of the document.
parameters.name: right

methods.name: duplicate
methods.description: Creates a duplicate of the document object.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the new document.

parameters.name: mergeLayersOnly
parameters.description: If ture, duplicates merged layers only.

methods.name: autoCount
methods.description: Counts the objects in the document.

parameters.name: channel
parameters.description: The channel to use for counting.

parameters.name: threshold
parameters.description: Threshold to use for counting. Range: 0 to 255.

description: The active containment object for the layers and all other objects in the script; the basic canvas for the file.
